attributes.action: send our long term prisoners to siberia prison camps
attributes.additional_details:
come to an arrangment with the russian goverment to have all our long term prisoners sent to the old siberian " gulag" prison camps for the term of the prisoners sentance.
pay the russian goverment £ 15000 per year per prisoner to look after them, thus saving ourselfs £ 20000 per year per prisoner on costs.
If we do this then this will leave plenty of Uk prison cells for the use of short term prisoners with a sentance under 5 years to be housed for the full term of the sentance given..
